alert.note: Alert for Benton; Camden; Hickory; Miller; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hickory, Benton, northwestern Miller, northwestern Camden and Morgan Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 644 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Warsaw to 6 miles northeast of Urbana. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Truman State Park, Truman Lake, Eldon, Osage Beach, Versailles, Village of Four Seasons, Warsaw, Lake Ozark, Lincoln, Cole Camp, Stover, Laurie, Sunrise Beach, Macks Creek, Barnett, Syracuse, Gravois Mills, Olean and Climax Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake of the Ozarks, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
